tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WindFarmLocations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    capacity DOUBLE,
    maintenance_contact TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    windfarm_id UUID,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type STRING,
    technician_name STRING
);

CREATE TABLE Turbines (
  turbine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  windfarm_id INT,
  model_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  commission_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (windfarm_id) REFERENCES WindFarms(id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  turbine_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (turbine_id) REFERENCES Turbines(turbine_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WindFarms (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    capacity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    commission_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Turbines (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    wind_farm_id UUID REFERENCES WindFarms(id),
    model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    status ENUM('operational', 'under_maintenance', 'faulty') NOT NULL,
    last_maintenance_date DATE,
    power_output FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    turbine_id UUID REFERENCES Turbines(id),
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    technician_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    wind_farm_id UUID REFERENCES WindFarms(id),
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    wind_direction VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE WindFarmLocation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    latitude DOUBLE NOT NULL,
    longitude DOUBLE NOT NULL
)
